key.name: Oh, du hast den Klassenaufstieg noch nicht abgeschlossen? Mach dir nichts draus! Es ist noch Zeit dafür! Wenn du für den Aufstieg in der Klasse bereit bist, solltest du dich zur $map:02000188$ begeben!

Viele sind hierher zur $map:02000188$ gekommen, in der Hoffnung, die Kaiserin zu sehen Du wirst hier sicher jemanden finden, der dir helfen kann, in der Klasse aufzusteigen. Geh mal rüber in die $map:02000188$ und frage dort einmal nach.
Hast du dich schon entschieden, in welcher Klasse du aufsteigen möchtest? Du solltest auch in Erwägung ziehen, Leute mit Erfahrung in der $map:02000188$ anzusprechen.
$MyPCName$, du bist erfolgreich in deiner Klasse aufgestiegen! Glückwunsch! Ich drücke dir die Daumen!
Hey. Yeah, you. Take this flier about $map:02000107$.
Say that you're not interested.
You don't need to buy anything! I'm just saying that maybe you should consider changing your style at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>!
A place where you can change everything from top to bottom! That place is <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>!

If you go there, there will be <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000462$</font>, a part-timer who's handing out fliers just like me. <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000462$</font> will tell you how you can alter your style to become even trendier! Now, head on over!
Don't be afraid of change. There's no need to be afraid.
Welcome! I'm handing out copies of <font color="#ffd200">The Guide to Enjoying $map:02000107$ 100 Times More</font>. Would you like one?
Say that you're not interested.
It's just supposed to be a promotion of $map:02000107$! Is this your first time at $map:02000107$?
Ask what kind of shops are at $map:02000107$.

At <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>, you can go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000008$</font>, where you can change your hairstyle and makeup, <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000010$</font>, where you can change face, and <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000009$</font>, where you can dye your items.

In order to use the Beauty Salon's services, you will need <font color="#ffd200">Merits</font>. The different pricing options are a little difficult to explain here. For more detail, please go to the shop itself.
Did that answer all of your basic questions about $map:02000107$? If you're ever feeling a little down, please go enjoy $map:02000107$'s services!
Hey, can we talk for a second?
Ask what's going on.
I know this is a little random...but this is an emergency. How does my hair look? I just got it done at the Beauty Salon...
How is it? How does it look? ...No, no. No matter how many times I look at it, it just looks bad. I need to redo it.
Can you please go to $map:02000001$ to find my older brother $npc:11000331$ and tell him to bring money to $map:52000008$? I already spent all the money he gave me to do my hair.
Take the taxi instead of walking all the way there... The taxi isn't that expensive... The time wasted walking is a bigger waste...
Didn't leave yet? You do realize that the taxi will take you where you want to go that much more quickly?
You were looking for me? What do you need?
Relay $npc:11000154$'s message.
What? Ugh... Why does she do this to me? She said she'd behave if I let her tag along for the levee. But even though the levee has been canceled, she still insists on spending all this money.
If I keep giving her money, I'm going to be losing money faster than I can earn... Ugh...

Do you realize how popular cars are? With all this people in the showroom, there's simply no time to rest! I'm busier than I've ever been...but at least I'm getting tons of commission! Haha! With all this money coming in, I was even able to purchase a diamond ring so that I can propose to the one I love!
Ask who she is.
That's a secret! I'm planning on surprising her... So no one gets to know!
I left the box with the diamond ring with <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> for safekeeping... I'm sure it's safe, right? Actually...just to make sure...could you go check for me?
Ask where $npc:11000011$ is.

Where else would be a banker be other than the bank! Hahaha! <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> is inside <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000034$</font>! <font color="#ffd200">The building with a spinning Meso on top</font> is the <font color="#ffd200">bank</font>! Please ask if <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> has the ring safe and sound.
My jaw is sore from talking to all these people interested in cars. Whew.
Ah, $npc:11000325$'s ring? Not to worry! It's stored somewhere very safe.
Ask about this place.
This is the Goldus Bank, where reliability and safety are our top priorities. We store precious items for safekeeping. You are also welcome anytime if you have anything that you want stored away.
Since there is a Goldus Bank employee in every village, <font color="#ffd200">a stored item can be retrieved anywhere!</font>
I was also curious as to how big the earthquake was! If you're also curious, take a look through <font color="#ffd200">the telescope next to me</font>! This is no laughing matter!
Did you see? Did you see?
Confirm what you saw.
Deny you saw anything.
It's no joke right? Isn't that scary? Just imagining that earthquake makes me tremble in fear!
You're not as brave as you look, eh? You're not even looking directly down at it. Do you know how to look through a telescope?
Say that you are not afraid.
All right, if you say so... Anyway, if you ever get curious, feel free to come take a look anytime. You'll be quite surprised!

The earthquake didn't just split the ground. You can tell by looking behind me, but the ground is now elevated in certain areas. Just happens that the place we stored the cooking ingredients for the levee was where the ground was most impacted...
Although some bundles fell down the cliff, there are still some that have fortunately remained on top of the elevated land.
Could you climb up and bring <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000063$</font> back? If you use the <font color="#ffd200">$skill:20000011$ skill</font>, you'll have a much easier time.
If you fall from a high place, you may hurt yourself. Be extra careful. It's dangerous.
Thank you so much! Thanks to you, we can at least send the cooking ingredients for the levee to $map:02000001$!
Hey, $MyPCName$! Did you hear the rumors? They say that there's going to be a special event at $map:02000123$?
Ask what kind of an event it's going to be.
To celebrate their alliance with $npc:11000185$, Goldus Construction is handing out their newly formed <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartment Ticket</font>.
Ask if that apartment is any good.
I'm not sure yet... You're going to have be there to know... Free tickets are being given out... This is a can't-miss opportunity!
Ask where a ticket can be obtained.

<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000600$</font> at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000123$</font> is handing out <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartment Tickets</font> on a first-come, first-served basis. You should go if you're interested!
I've also only heard rumors about this... If you really want to find out some information, you should go see for yourself.
Hello? I am <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000600$</font>, Ms. Kim's assistant. Have you come to see the house?
Say that you want to receive the $item:30000145$.
Ah, I see! Well, I'll need to check and see if there are any tickets left. As soon as the news broke that free tickets were being handed out, people came like moths to a flame!

Oh! There happens to be exactly one ticket left! Here! Take the $item:30000145$. Use this ticket when you want to move into the Maple Apartments. However, there are some <font color="#ffd200">conditions</font> you need to know about!
Ask what the conditions are.
<font color="#ffd200">Those who already own a house cannot use the Maple Apartments!</font> This promotion was specifically started for those who have not yet been able to find a satisfactory home.
Ask how the Maple Apartments can be used.

If you click on the <font color="#ffd200">house-shaped icon in front of the Maple Apartments</font>, a contract will come up. Read the contract carefully and submit the coupon to move in! Quite simple, right?
And during this special event, <font color="#ffd200">supplies for designing your own special interiors</font> are being provided. Please enjoy the various amenities at the Maple Apartments!
Ask where the Maple Apartments are.
Ah! The location of the <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartments</font>is<font color="#ffd200"> written on the ticket</font> that I gave you!
You must have put a lot of effort into your training. I know that the monsters couldn't have been easy to fight, but now, you seem to look like a proper Knight!
I will teach you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Knight</font>. This is of the utmost importance, so be ready to listen. Let me know when you are ready.

Do you want to know how to become a stronger Knight? The path to becoming even stronger is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!
You must have put great effort into training. Let's see... Such strong shoulders and fearless eyes! I can feel the confidence! You now seem like a proper Berserker.

I will teach you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Berserker</font>. This is essential in becoming an even more powerful Berserker, so come talk to me when you are ready for the next step.

The secret behind getting stronger is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials.

Have you kept up with your reading? You are aware that Wizards must always be reading, to remain well-versed with the complicated properties of magic? Let's see... It seems like you've been studying extremely hard. You now carry with yourself the air of a proper Wizard.

I will show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Wizard</font>. The advice I am going to impart onto you is of the highest importance, so come talk to me again once you have prepared yourself. Remember, Wizards must be able to quickly comprehend new information, no matter how difficult or arcane the issues may be... You know that, right?

Heh, dying to know, eh? The secret is <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>! There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>...
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill! Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!

I realize how laborious the training may have been. However, it is important to pray upon the heavens during such trying times. I can sense that through rigorous prayer and training, the spirit of a proper, devout Priest flows through you.
I will pass on to you what is needed <font color="#ffd200">to become a stronger Priest</font>. When you are ready to listen to the good word, please come talk to me again.

There is no special secret to becoming a powerful Priest. Remaining true to the fundamentals, remembering the basics... These are the most important tenants to keep. Diligent prayer with a pure heart is a foundation you can rely on for the rest of eternity.

There are different ways to get stronger... And one way is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials.
Hunting all those monsters could not have been an easy task. But I'm sure you are now proud to be a member of the Green Hood! You even look like a proper Archer now!
I will now show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Archer</font>. What I'm about to tell you is extremely important, so talk to me when you're ready.

So you want to know how to become even more powerful as a proud <font color="#ffd200">Green Hood</font> member? It's through the use of <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>! There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!
I can tell you've been training hard! I can sense the essence of a true Heavy Gunner from you now!
Well then, I'll show what it's going to take <font color="#ffd200">to become a stronger Heavy Gunner</font>. You're going to want to remember this! Come talk to me again when you're ready to listen!

Heh, so you want to know what it takes to become stronger? The way to become stronger...is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>! There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill! Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!
Hunting monsters isn't such a walk in the park, huh? How goes the training? Hm... I'm starting to get the feeling that you're starting to look like a proper Thief.
I will show you the way in <font color="#ffd200">becoming a stronger Thief</font>. This will be vital in your development, so come back when you feel prepared.

Heh, so you're eager to learn, aren't you? The way to becoming stronger lies in <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials.
...What's this? I'm not used to someone talking to me first... Ah, if my memory serves me correctly, I was the one who led you down the Assassin's path. How does the path of darkness suit you?

Your eyes... They seem ready to tread an even darker path. Very well. I shall show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Assassin</font>. What I'm about to tell you should not be taken lightly, so come back to me when you feel prepared.

So, you want to know what is required to become even more powerful? The path to true power lies in <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

Remember that the type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials...
Don't think because I'm being nice this one time means that I'm going to help you all the time! All enter this world alone, and leave alone in the end...
Achoo! Sniff. Ah, hey you. Can you—ACHOO!—h-help me?
I have a pollen allergy... Achoo! The honey from these wildflowers is supposed to—achoo!—help with that.
Sniff. I can't even get close to the flowers because of my allergies… Achoo! Can you collect the $item:30000125$ from the <font color="#ffd200">wildflowers</font> for me? Sniff.
There are wildflowers all over <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000008$</font>, so there's no reason to go out of your way. Just pick some the ones...achoo!...near me.
Achoo! You've already harvested them! Sniff. Hopefully this pollen allergy will annoy me no longer...
Mmm, what a refreshing scent. I can feel my breathing has improved, and it's stopped my sneezing! Here, I've prepared a gift to show my thanks... Ah...ah...achoo!
Can you help me out?
Ask what's wrong.
We need to teach the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000041$</font> a lesson! Why? They're harassing people! Do we need another reason? You'll help, right?
I wonder why the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000041$</font> have suddenly increased in number?
Thanks. I feel like this path has become safer thanks to you.
Can I ask one more favor? There are monsters on the forest trail that connects to here, and $npc:11000410$ is dealing with them alone. Could you help?
I'll take care of things here, you should go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000010$</font> and help $npc:11000410$.
$npc:11000409$ sent you to help me? Thanks for coming! I was just thinking it'd be nice to have some help.
This forest trail is the only way to get to $npc:11000407$. He tells strange stories every once in a while... But that's why everyone loves to visit him.

The monsters have made it too dangerous to travel on this road. $npc:11000409$ and I are trying to defeat the monsters and make this path safer. It's a lot of work for just the two of us. That's probably why $npc:11000409$ asked for your help.
Well? Will you help me get rid of the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000042$</font> here? I would be ever thankful for your assistance!
It's not going to be easy dealing with the monsters. Don't give up on me.
You've already dealt with all of them? Amazing! I'll take care of the rest. Head on over to the town.
It's been a while... I see that your skills have improved. You're turning into a serious Knight now.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? Don't forget to keep upgrading if you want to become a guard Knight for Tria and the Empress! I'll let you in on another tip today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> so you can try it out! It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
It's been some time... You're covered in scars, yet your eyes shine with determination. A true warrior becomes tougher through the virtue of their hardships.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'll fill you in on another tip today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Long time no see! Have you been reading? A Wizard is nothing without his thirst for knowledge! Let's see... Your available skills have increased! You're becoming a true Wizard!
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? Allow me to share another tip with you today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Hello again. I hope all is well. Your available skills have increased through prayer and progress. I'm happy to see you becoming a true Priest.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'm going to let you in on another tip today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat powerful elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Good to see you! I'm happy to see that you've become a proper Green Hood! I'm so proud watching you progress as a true Ranger.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'll let you in on another tip...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. They say you'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. I hope it will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
It's been so long! Are you having fun on your journey? Your available skills must have increased by now... You're well on your way to becoming a true Heavy Gunner!
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? Let me pass on another tip today!
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. I'm sure it will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Hello again. Your available skills must have increased by now, right? Good. You're well on your way to becoming a proper Thief.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'm going to teach you something new today.
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
...You again. What is it this time? Haven't I helped you out enough?

Have you been upgrading skills like I told you to? You must have some questions, searching me out like this. You'll probably keep bothering me until I help you out, so I'll give you a tip to shut you up.
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find, as they are special. You'll have to<font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> so you can try it out! You can use it when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Welcome to the Royal Guard. We're going to start with basic training. I'm going to show you attack skills first.
<font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font> is a basic attack skill you can use. It's powerful, and used to attack surrounding enemies by swinging a longsword.

You haven't forgotten how to open the <font color="#ffd200">skill window</font> to add <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font> to a Quickslot, have you? Now, try practicing <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font>!
Don't do a half-baked job just because it's practice!
Well? Can you feel the energy emanating from the sword? There's something you need to know when using this skill. It <font color="#ffd200">consumes SP</font> when you use it.

Things have finally quieted down...
Ask what’s going on.
The little girl from $map:02000203$ was going around town causing a scene for awhile. She was looking for "<font color="#ffd200">the person who left behind the Onyx</font>".
I think she was trying to return a lost item to its owner, but the owner can't be found. You can go see for yourself if you're curious.
Who knows? It might be someone you know. Might as well check it out.
Ah… My legs hurt… I've been wandering around $map:02000076$ for so long, but no one will come forward...
Ask what’s going on.
Someone lost this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font>. I'm looking for the owner... Say, do you know the owner of this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font>?
Ask what the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> is.
Say that you aren't the owner.
Say that you are the owner.
You...don't know what a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> is? All you need is a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> for $npc:11000508$ to boost your items!
It's important to have powerful items when going on an adventure, right? I'm getting ready here because I thought I should have at least one legendary weapon before I embark on an adventure.
Ask what she's preparing for.
I'm trading my own items for other people's <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> so I can use the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> to boost my own items!

But then... A little while ago someone dumped a whole bunch of <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> and just took off. I debated with myself for some time, wondering if I should just keep it... But I was raised with values, you see.
But looking for the owner has been very difficult... Hey, do you want this stuff? I don't feel good about carrying it on me. You should take it!
Go to $npc:11000508$, or let's do an exchange for something I'm carrying! It's best to use up a windfall like this right away!
Ah… Really? It's just not my style to keep things that aren't mine... Why don't you take them off my hands?
Don't be modest! I'm not trying to pass the buck... It just feels like you're not bothered by this as much as I am!
Go to $npc:11000508$, or let's do an exchange for something I'm carrying! It's best to use up a windfall like this right away!
Oh, yeah? Why would you dump all of this stuff in front of me? You shouldn't tempt people like that.
Either way, you should consider yourself lucky. I was raised with values. That's why I was trying to find the owner.
Hello, $MyPCName$! Do you have a moment to talk about <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> and our professional <font color="#ffd200">maids</font>?
Ask what <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> is.

<font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> is a company that provides training and job opportunities to the youth of Maple World. You could call us the best <font color="#ffd200">human resource development center</font> in Maple World.

You know that Maple World is comprised of various islands, right? Since Victoria Island is the central island of Maple World, a lot of the youth from the smaller islands often dream of moving to Victoria Island.

Dream Naidz helps young people in pursuit of the <font color="#ffd200">Victoria Dream</font> through our various <font color="#ffd200">human resource development programs</font>. Our program for developing service industry personnel is especially popular. I myself completed service training at <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> to become the wonderful guide you see before you.
Uh… I got excited and lost my train of thought. Anyway, you can talk to $npc:11000700$ to find out more.
You can find out more information about <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> if you speak to $npc:11000700$.
Hello. My name is $npcName:11000700$ and I'm here to promote <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font>. Can I help you with something?
Ask to learn more about the <font color="#ffd200">maids</font>.

For times when you're exhausted by an abundance of housework, or when you don't want to sit alone in an empty house, just hire a <font color="#ffd200">maid</font>! You'll have a chance to hire a <font color="#ffd200">maid</font> after you buy a house.
And if you ever need a maid or anything maid-related after that, come find me. I promise to do my best at finding the exact maid you need, $MyPCName$!

Ich muss die Abkürzung zur $map:63000012$ nehmen ... Ich muss mich mit meinen Kollegen treffen, die aus der ganzen Welt hergekommen sind, um unser weiteres Vorgehen zu besprechen. Begib dich zum Gebiet $map:63000011$ und versammle $npc:11001233[gender:1]$ und $npc:11001232[gender:1]$.
Wer sind $npc:11001232[gender:1]$ und $npc:11001233[gender:1]$?
$npc:11001232[gender:1]$ und $npc:11001233[gender:1]$ sind die geschicktesten von Arazards 16 Anhängern ... Warte mal ... Warum erkläre ich das ausgerechnet dir?
$MyPCName$, willst du dich wirklich in solch einer Lage mit mir anlegen? Oder hast du vielleicht dein Gedächtnis verloren, nachdem dir $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ eins übergezogen hat?

$MyPCName$, mach dich startklar! Arazard, Anführer der Runenfechter, hat sein Leben durch die Hand von $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ verloren. Diese Untat ist unverzeihlich! Finde heraus, warum $npcName:11001231$ dieses Verbrechen beging und was er jetzt im Schilde führt. Worauf wartest du denn noch?! Geh zum Gebiet $map:63000011$!

$MyPCName$, mach dich startklar! Arazard, Anführer der Runenfechter, hat sein Leben durch die Hand von $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ verloren. Diese Untat ist unverzeihlich! Finde heraus, warum $npcName:11001231$ dieses Verbrechen beging und was er jetzt im Schilde führt. Worauf wartest du denn noch?! Begib dich ins Gebiet $map:63000011$!

$MyPCName$! Was geht hier vor sich? Als $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ gehört hat, dass du allein die Verfolgung von $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ aufgenommen hast, ist er losgegangen, um dich zu suchen. Hast du ihn zufällig getroffen?
(Erkläre, was passiert ist.)

Verstehe ... Welch Erleichterung! Ich verstehe immer noch nicht, wie $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ sich gegen unseren Lehrer wenden konnte ... Ich kann seine Taten nicht mal ansatzweise nachvollziehen. Was er Arazard angetan hat, ist unverzeihlich. Er hat Terrunkaliber betrogen und all seine Brüder der Runenfechter!
Arazard war nicht nur unser Lehrer ... Er war wie ein Vater für mich. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ ... Dafür wirst du bezahlen!

Tut mir leid ... Ich wollte nicht nerven, aber die Sache geht mir nahe. Hab ich dir eigentlich schon mal erzählt, dass $npcName:21900095[gender:0]$ mir gesagt hat, ich solle $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ zur $map:63000012$ bringen?
Genau.

$npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ erkundet den $map:52000015$ auf der Suche nach den übrigen Runera, die $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ folgen. Ich weiß nicht, wann sie zurück sein wird. Aber in der Zwischenzeit könntest du mir helfen, $itemPlural:30000439$ am Runenmagie-Kommunikationsturm zu sammeln, oder?
Könntest du mir helfen, die $itemPlural:30000439$ zum Runenmagie-Kommunikationsturm zu bringen, bis $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ zurück ist?

Ah, vielen Dank! Ich vermute, dass einige von uns noch nichts von unserem Krisentreffen gehört haben. Wenn aber die Magie der Runenschriftrolle versiegt, dann stellt der Kommunikationsturm seinen Betrieb ein ...

Die ganze Sache ist so dämlich. Die Runera, die Spezialisten für Runenmagie, und wir Pelgia, die sich auf den Schwertkampf konzentrieren, sind uns schon lange uneinig. Aber unsere philosophischen Unterschiede haben noch nie zu solch einer Gewalt geführt. Und daher haben wir unsere Fraktion versammelt und wollen uns schnell um diese Verräter kümmern.

All diese Kämpfe sind so überflüssig. Für den modernen Runenfechter ist die Macht über die Runenmagie ebenso wichtig wie das Können mit dem Schwert. Diese imaginären Grenzen sind also vollkommen sinnfrei. Sag, wo ist deine übliche Klinge? Hast du sie vergessen, als du $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ gejagt hast?
Ich weiß es nicht mehr.

Tut mir leid ... Du musst noch immer unter Schock stehen, nachdem du Arazards Tod durch $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ mit ansehen musstest ... Hier, nimm das. Es ist schon etwas abgenutzt, wird dir aber gute Dienste leisten, bis du etwas besseres findest.
Hmm ... Warum braucht $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ denn so lange ...? Ich mache mir Sorgen, dass ihr etwas passiert sein könnte. Würdest du sie im $map:52000015$ suchen und zurückbringen?
Hmm ... Warum braucht $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ denn so lange ...? Ich mache mir Sorgen, dass ihr etwas passiert sein könnte. Würdest du sie im $map:52000015$ suchen und zurückbringen?
Uff ... Es war eine Falle ...
Sie ... sind in die Höhle gelaufen ... Du musst dich beeilen ...
Wer?
Dieser verdammte Runera-Abschaum ... Die Anhänger von $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ waren hier. $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ hat ganz allein ihre Verfolgung aufgenommen ...
Uff ... Dieser Runera-Abschaum ... $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ hat allein die Verfolgung von$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$s Anhängern aufgenommen. Beeilung ... Hilf ihm!
Oh! $MyPCName$! Hast du dich verirrt? Was machst du denn hier, so weit draußen?
Die Suche nach $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ führt mich her.
Lass doch die Ausreden. Wärst du wirklich wegen $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ hier, hättest du sie in Sicherheit gebracht ... Du wusstest, wie gefährlich es ist, und dennoch bist du hier ...

Nun, es ist zu spät, um umzukehren. Da du nun schon ins kalte Wasser gesprungen bist, musst du auch dranbleiben. $MyPCName$, erinnerst du dich an die Techniken <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font> und <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font>?
An deinem leeren Blick kann ich erkennen, dass du es vergessen hast. Diese Techniken sind die wichtigsten Grundlagen eines Runenfechters ...
Ich sehe es dir an der Nasenspitze an, dass deine Erinnerung zurückkommt ... Zeig mir, was du gelernt hast!
Ich sehe es dir an der Nasenspitze an, dass deine Erinnerung zurückkommt ... Zeig mir, was du gelernt hast!
$MyPCName$! Ist alles in Ordnung?
Was ist passiert?

Sie haben sich offenbar gegen dich verbündet, um dich so lange abzulenken, bis $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ fliehen konnte. Ich kann nicht glauben, dass du dich den Achtklingen – den größten der Runenfechter – gestellt hast und auch noch heil davongekommen bist. Wäre $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ nicht gewesen, wären weder du noch ich jetzt hier.
Hier ... Ich sollte dir das von $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ geben, wenn du aufwachst. Das sollte bei der Heilung deiner Wunden helfen.
Kannst du laufen? $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ will mit dir reden. Da du $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ zuletzt gesehen hast ... Nun, es gibt eine Menge Fragen, die beantwortet werden müssen.
Kannst du laufen? $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ will mit dir reden. Da du $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ zuletzt gesehen hast ... Nun, es gibt eine Menge Fragen, die beantwortet werden müssen.

Wie geht es dir, $MyPCName$? Du siehst besser aus, als ich dachte. Obwohl sie unseren Orden hintergangen haben, werden die Achtklingen als größte Runenfechter unserer Zeit angesehen. Es ist bemerkenswert, dass du ihren Angriff überleben konntest und noch alles dran ist. Das beweist dein gutes Training unter $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.
Aber genug der Höflichkeiten. Nun will ich ein paar Antworten. Du hast den Angriff von $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ auf Arazard selbst gesehen, ja?
Natürlich!
Kannst du mir mehr darüber erzählen, was $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ während der Konfrontation getan und gesagt hat?
Nun, er bezeichnete Arazard als Heuchler.
Hmm ... Als Heuchler ...? Warum sollte er so etwas zu Arazard sagen ...?
Dein Lehrer, $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$, hat sich mit anderen zusammengetan, um die Verräter zu finden, die dich im $map:52000015$ angegriffen haben.

Warte mal! Was glaubst du, wo du hingehst? Wenn du deinem Lehrer nachlaufen willst, dann vergiss es schnell wieder. Mit deinen derzeitigen Fähigkeiten würdest du ihn nur aufhalten. Bis $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ zurückkommt, musst du mit $npcName:11001234[gender:0]$ die Festung bewachen. Die Befehle komme nicht von mir, sondern von $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.
Bis $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ zurückkommt, sollst du die Festung gemeinsam mit $npcName:11001234[gender:0]$ verteidigen. Die Befehle kommen nicht von mir, sondern von $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.
Hmm? Was war das? Hey, hast du das gerade gehört?
Ich hab nichts gehört.
Hmm ... Wirklich seltsam.
Wusste ich doch, dass ich einen Knall aus dem $map:52000016$ gehört habe. Aber ... das ist ein heiliger Ort ... Wir dürfen ihn ohne Erlaubnis nicht betreten. Was tun, was tun ...?
Wir sollten das wohl mal überprüfen.
Ist schon in Ordnung.

Genau ... Das wäre das Beste. Zuerst sollten wir $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ von der Situation berichten. Warum gehst du nicht schon vor und schaust dir die Störung im $map:52000016$ an, während ich mit ihm rede? Wenn du Angst hast, kannst du hier warten, bis ich zurückkomme.

Nein ... Laute Knallgeräusche kommen nicht einfach von allein. Wir müssen das überprüfen. Ich werde $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ von der Sache unterrichten. Du gehst voraus und untersuchst den $map:52000016$. Wenn du Angst hast, kannst du hier warten, bis ich zurückkomme.
In Ordnung. Geh los und untersuche die Geräusche aus dem $map:52000016$. Wenn du Angst hast, warte hier, bis ich zurückkomme.
Hat dich $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ schon wieder alleine gelassen?
Er meinte, ich solle Verstärkung mitbringen, um bei der Suche zu helfen.
Hmm. Alles klar ... Wenn $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ das sagt ...

Den zweiten Suchtrupp zusammenzustellen, dauert länger, als ich erwartet hatte ... Und wir müssen auch noch mit den anderen Runenfechtern sprechen, die sich versammelt haben. Ich denke, $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ hat dich hier zurückgelassen, um dich zu schützen. Aber ohne Unterstützung wird er einige Mühe haben.

Mag sein, dass du ihn aufhältst, aber es wäre besser für $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$, dich an seiner Seite zu haben. Gehe ins Gebiet $map:63000013$ und bitte $npc:11001257[gender:0]$ darum, dich dorthin zu schicken, wohin $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ ging.

Mag sein, dass du ihn aufhältst, aber es wäre besser für $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$, dich an seiner Seite zu haben. Gehe ins Gebiet $map:63000013$ und bitte $npc:11001257[gender:0]$ darum, dich dorthin zu schicken, wohin $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ ging.
Hmm ... Warum haben wir in letzter Zeit so viele Besucher? Meine Kräfte lassen nach. <font color="#909090">(Er seufzt.)</font>
So, why are you here?
Schick mich dorthin, wohin $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ gegangen ist.

Wie? Du willst den ganzen Weg nach $map:2000001$ auf dich nehmen? Hmm ... Der Weg ist sehr weit. Das bedeutet, dass das eine Menge Runenkraft verbrauchen wird ... Nun ja ... Wenn du unbedingt gehen musst, seh ich mal nach, ob wir noch genug Energie haben, um dich dorthin zu schicken. Warte hier.
Es scheint alles bereit zu sein! Ich kann dich jederzeit ins Gebiet $map:2000001$ schicken.
$MyPCName$? What brings you all the way here?
$npcName:11001567[gender:0]$ sent me.
$npcName:11001567[gender:0]$... He didn't have to... But, I have to admit...
I feel reassured with you here by my side, $MyPCName$. The future would have been hard for me to handle alone.
Although I was promised the cooperation of the Tria Royals, not sure if it's a coincidence, but it appears that many things are occurring throughout Maple World.
The mysterious explosion that occurred in the Door of Light region... The reports of abnormal behavior of monsters all over Maple World...
I think these occurrences have something to do with Holstatt's betryal. Because of this, we have to track Holstatt and at the same time investigate the abnormal events occurring in Maple World.
$MyPCName$, please investigate Maple World while the Terrun Calibre and I track Holstatt. Would you be able to do this?
Yes, I can.
I admire your strength to carry on, even after everything you've gone through.
Gut, geh du schon mal nach $map:02000062$ und schließ dich der Karawane für die Audienz an.
The goal is to check if there are any items among the court goods that Holstatt might have an eye on.
Safely escorting the caravan to Tria honors the new alliance with the Terrun Calibre and also is a good chance to show your strength as a Runeblade.
Your first mission is quite a big one. As your teacher, I hope you will grow through this mission.
See you again, $MyPCName$.

Hmm... At this point, don't you think you should use it like a Runeblade? You can only be sure it fits your body if you spin quickly with <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font>, like a true Runeblade.

Hmm... At this point, don't you think you should use it like a Runeblade? You can only be sure it fits your body if you spin quickly with <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font>, like a true Runeblade.
Sehr gut. Mit dieser Technik solltest du in der Lage sein, mehrere Gegner in der Nähe auf einen Streich auszuschalten.
Verwende <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font> noch ein Mal, nur um sicher zu gehen, dass du es auch draufhast. Zerschmettere deine Gegner mit der Wucht deiner Klinge!
Verwende <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font> noch ein Mal, nur um sicher zu gehen, dass du es auch draufhast. Zerschmettere deine Gegner mit der Wucht deiner Klinge!
Sehr gut. Diese Klinge scheint tatsächlich wie für dich gemacht zu sein.
Ich brauche etwas Zeit, um darüber nachzudenken, wie ich das Chaos beseitigen kann, das du angerichtet hast.
(Packe $npc:11001623[gender:0]$ am Kragen.)

Hahaha... You'd better <font color="#ffd200">handle</font> this more carefully if you're worried about the <font color="#ffd200">safety</font> of the people you're looking for. You can't punch your way out of everything.
Quietly glare at $npc:11001623[gender:0]$.

You're more stubborn than you look. Let me break it down for you. If you strike me down, our members will respond in accordance to the <font color="#ffd200">rules of the Underground</font>. An eye for an eye.
What will happen to the people you're looking for? Hahaha... I'm about to tear up just thinking of the <font color="#ffd200">tragedies</font> that will fall upon them... So, what's it going to be?
...Untie $npc:11001623[gender:0]$.
So you're not a complete idiot. Well then, let's start brainstorming.
Wait for $npc:11001623[gender:0]$ to speak.
...... <font color="#909090">($npc:11001623[gender:0]$s Augen bleiben geschlossen. Er ist in Gedanken versunken.)</font>
...... <font color="#909090">($npc:11001623[gender:0]$s Augen bleiben geschlossen. Er ist in Gedanken versunken.)</font>

Ich habe mich entschieden ... Du bist zwar eine geschmacklose Person, aber ich muss dir wohl trotzdem helfen. Unter einer Bedingung. Du musst den Champion vom $map:63000020$ finden und ihm zeigen, wer der Boss ist. Das ist der Preis. Tu es oder lass es.
$map:63000020$? Was ist das?

There's an <font color="#ffd200">arena</font> in the basement of Underworld. It's a place where you <font color="#ffd200">fight to the death</font> for riches and glory. It's the perfect place to prove yourself as a <font color="#ffd200">Gray Wolf</font>... Don't you agree?
Ich interessiere mich nicht für diese Art Ruhm.

Haha, of course... I heard you were known for being a <font color="#ffd200">person of justice</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000100$</font>... Well, if there's one kind of person I can't trust...

It's someone with no sense of the finer things, like you. Most all people want something... You can <font color="#ffd200">control</font> most people for as long as you like by feeding into their <font color="#ffd200">desires</font>.

But there's no way to control someone who wants nothing... But whatever, your arrogance is of no concern me. If you don't defeat the champion... Just know that you'll pay the appropriate <font color="#ffd200">price</font>.
Das war sowieso, was ich wollte.
Hah... I'd love to talk more, but I don't think there's anything left to say...
If you go outside you'll find <font color="#ffd200">someone</font> waiting to guide you to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000020$</font>. So go on, move out.
Hast du eine Frage an mich?
Ich will etwas über den Champion vom $map:63000020$ erfahren.

His name is <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$</font>. But in the $map:63000020$, he's known more by his nickname: <font color="#ffd200">the Gallant Warrior</font>. I've seen many battle in the $map:63000020$... But he's in a totally <font color="#ffd200">different class</font> of his own.
Was ist an ihm so besonders?
Firstly, he has a <font color="#ffd200">superhuman</font> body. He's immune to any kind of impact as far as I can tell... It's like he doesn't feel any <font color="#ffd200">pain</font> at all.
Tell him your fists are strong as well.

...Considering you destroyed this $map:63000016$, I can't disagree. But the question is if your fists will have any effect on $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$. He's never been in a fight with an evenly matched opponent before.

His record in the $map:63000020$ is <font color="#ffd200">47 KOs in 48 bouts</font>... And he knocked all 47 of those opponents out with just one blow. Do you understand...? A <font color="#ffd200">single blow</font>...
Tell him that's because he's only had to fight weaklings thus far.

No, you're underestimating the Underworld arena. The $map:63000020$ isn't a place for playground fights. It's simply that $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is abnormally <font color="#ffd200">strong</font>. He's more than human. There's only been <font color="#ffd200">one person</font> who could go toe-to-toe with him.
Sorry... I've been rambling. <font color="#ffd200">He</font> won't accept any more delays... It's time to head down to the $map:63000017$.
Tell him you've heard enough about "him."
...I've radioed in to let them know you're coming. Go find <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001545[gender:0]$</font>. He'll be waiting for you at <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000017$</font>.
Solltest du als Fremdenführer fungieren?

Ha... I have my own stuff to deal with, so no. But now that I've met you...maybe we could have had some fun. If you use the <font color="#ffd200">elevator to the right</font>, it will take you to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000017$</font>. Go on...

...I've just radioed in to let them know you're coming, so look for <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001545[gender:0]$</font>. He'll be waiting at <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000017$</font>. Use the <font color="#ffd200">elevator at the right</font> that connects to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000017$</font> to go there.
What is it? Do you have something you want to say? Spit it out. I'm busy.
Answer that $npc:11001620[gender:1]$ sent you.

Hm? So the manager sent you... You're the one they call the <font color="#ffd200">Gray Wolf</font>? You look nothing like what the rumors say... You certainly don't appear very strong, yet you're planning to enter the $map:63000020$ to participate in a bare-knuckle fight? How absurd.
Gibt es ein Problem?
This is not a place for insolent <font color="#ffd200">rookies</font>. You can't merely compensate your lack of skill with the latest and greatest <font color="#ffd200">gear</font>.
Tell him you don't need gear to prove your worth.
Too arrogant for your own good... Anyway, there's no way I can send you into the $map:63000020$ so ill-equipped. Take this. It's nothing fancy, but it's better than bare fists. Don't you agree?

Granted, we may have fished it out of the gutter after another fighter threw it away, but it's still got some life left in it. Don't worry about it too much—just <font color="#ffd200">equip</font> it.
There we go. At least you're equipped with knuckles... Hm... That's right. Now you look more like a <font color="#ffd200">fighter</font> about to participate in the $map:63000020$.
Bring mich zum $map:63000020$.

So... As you can see this place is <font color="#ffd200">a mess</font>. That's because the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:29000098$</font> has been coming out through the sewers and wreaking havoc. We've been doing our best to handle it using the $npc:29000099$, but the real <font color="#ffd200">problem</font> lies elsewhere.
Wo liegt das Problem?
What? You think can take care of it for me?
Ich hab zu viel zu tun, um darauf warten zu können, dass er sich um seine Probleme kümmert.

I don't know why you'd take this upon yourself, but... The real problem is that the $npc:29000098$ has swallowed the $item:30000553$. Do you think you can work your magic and <font color="#ffd200">retrieve</font> the <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000553$</font> for me?

If the $item:30000553$ can't be found...the boss will <font color="#ffd200">kill me</font>. <font color="#909090">($npc:11001545[gender:0]$'s face grows dismal at the mere mention of "the boss.")</font>

What? Weren't you bragging about how you'd take care of any sort of big mess? The <font color="#ffd200">$npc:29000098$</font> that oozed in through the sewers is the real problem. I'm sure the ones who took the $item:30000553$ are there too. Please go and <font color="#ffd200">retrieve</font> the $item:30000553$.
What about the ledger? What happened to the $item:30000553$?
Get the $item:30000553$ to $npc:11001545[gender:0]$.
Whew... The book is a bit of a mess, but thank goodness it's been found. You're way more skilled than you look!
Well, we've managed to put out the biggest fire, but the rest... I'm sure the guys assigned to the job will take care of it, right?
Tell him that you're tired of waiting.
Ah, alright. I get it. $map:63000020$. I was just about to get on with it... <font color="#909090">($npc:11001545[gender:0]$'s walkie-talkie starts rasping noisily.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Tssshk-)</font> What is it? <font color="#909090">(Tssshk-)</font> What! ...Hell. Alright. I'm on the way.

Heh... Sorry, but there's a <font color="#ffd200">problem</font> I need to deal with. I won't be able to guide you. <font color="#909090">($npc:11001545[gender:0]$ smiles sheepishly and begins to mutter.)</font> There's always a <font color="#ffd200">fire to put out</font> around this place... Why are you looking at me like that? You think I'm doing this on purpose?
Tell him he'll have to take care of his own problems this time.

You don't have to be so angry... I'll contact my colleague via walkie-talkie... You go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000018$</font> and look for someone named <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001546[gender:0]$</font>. He'll discuss the fighter registration and anything else you need to know.
Oh, and one more thing... You should know that I'm still unsure whether you're actually the famous Gray Wolf or not...
Make sure to back $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$, the Gallant Warrior, into a corner. That's the only way you'll ever get a punch in.

Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000018$</font> and look for someone named <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001546[gender:0]$</font>. He'll let you know about everything, including the fighter registration.
What are you looking at? Want to get beat?
Hat $npc:11001545[gender:0]$ die Nachricht erhalten?

$npc:11001545[gender:0]$'s message? ...Oh! It's you! You're going up against the Gallant Warrior, the $map:63000020$ champion! They call you the Gray Wolf, the one who cowed the members of the Underworld into submission with bare fists! ...Wait. You're the famous Gray Wolf...?

<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$'s gaze is full of skepticism.)</font> ...You look kinda weak. You're way smaller than me, too. Are you sure you can fight? $npc:11001545[gender:0]$...that moron must have sent the wrong person. What a <font color="#ffd200">bonehead</font>.
Answer that you are indeed the one who's going up against the $map:63000020$ champion.
What? You're the right person? ...Give me a sec. <font color="#909090">(Tssshk-)</font> Hey, $npc:11001545[gender:0]$! Are you sure you sent the right fighter?
<font color="#909090">(Tssshk-)</font> Yeah, that's what I'm asking! There's no way this is him! What...? You sure? The manager...? Fine.
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ still looks skeptical after talking on the walkie-takie.)</font> I can't believe it...
What are you looking at? Got something to say?
Wann beginnt der Kampf?
Your fight is a bonus match, meaning you'll go on after all the scheduled fights are done. We'll know when that is after we <font color="#ffd200">contact the boss</font>.
Ich darf keine Zeit verlieren.
...Look around you. Can't you see this place is crawling with fighters preparing for their matches? You're not any more <font color="#ffd200">important</font> than them, you know.
The $map:63000020$ is known as a pit of chaos because of how brutal all the fighters are. Still, none of them are a match for $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$'s <font color="#ffd200">fists</font>.

Seriously, the guy is in a league of his own! To think someone as puny as you is going against $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$... Say, why don't you go pummel that <font color="#ffd200">punching bag</font> instead of standing around. Go <font color="#ffd200">warm up</font> and stop wasting my time, huh?
...Nod silently and agree.

There you go. Loosen up a bit so you won't be so tense when you get knocked out. <font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ really thinks I'm unqualified... I'm sure his opinion doesn't matter.)</font>
You should stop fooling around. Go give that <font color="#ffd200">sand bag</font> a good clobbering to <font color="#ffd200">warm up</font>.
Have you finished warming up already?
Tell him you're ready.
Smart. No sense tiring yourself out when you're just going to get knocked out in one punch anyway...
Tell him a match against the champion is mere child's play for you.

Your arrogance is...astounding. It's almost <font color="#ffd200">pathological</font>. Maybe you need your head checked... Well, you'll need to visit the <font color="#ffd200">hospital</font> once $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ wipes the floor with you anyway... Two birds, one stone! Ha!
But you know what's crazy? That they're allowing you to fight against $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ in a bonus match. That's unheard of!
Or maybe the boss just wants you to suffer like hell. ...If that's the case, you have no idea how rough this is going to be. Heh heh...
Hey, do you even know how <font color="#ffd200">terrifying</font> of a place the $map:63000020$ is? ...No, I suppose you don't. What would a punk like you know?

You know, I'm not so sure you have any clue what it really means to be a part of the $map:63000020$, but you should know that even the greatest fighters end up <font color="#ffd200">spending their lives in the hospital</font> at the end of their careers. A punk like you will only end up retiring sooner!

Hmm... Are you keeping anything up your sleeves? Maybe you have some kind of secret <font color="#ffd200">skill</font> you've been hiding. Well, let's take a look. I'll give you some <font color="#ffd200">pointers</font>!

Hmm... Are you keeping anything up your sleeves? Maybe you have some kind of secret <font color="#ffd200">skill</font> you've been hiding. Well, let's take a look. I'll give you some <font color="#ffd200">pointers</font>!
...W-What was that? There was some kind of...<font color="#ffd200">intense energy</font> radiating from your fists... Or d-did I imagine that?
Gibt es ein Problem?
Problem? Ha! Not at all. <font color="#ffd200">Everyone</font> knows how to use a skill like that.
Don't get so cocky. If you've got any other <font color="#ffd200">secret skills</font>, show them to me.
Don't get so cocky. If you've got any other <font color="#ffd200">secret skills</font>, show them to me.
... <font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ is standing alone and staring off into the distance.)</font>
Denkst du dasselbe über diese Fähigkeit?
Ah! Y-You mean that skill?
Perhaps not! Ahem! ...Now that skill... I'll give it to you, that's pretty impressive. But it's still nowhere near my <font color="#ffd200">level</font>. Sorry, Charlie!
Zeig mir, was du kannst.

...Of course. <font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$'s face looks as though he feels insulted.)</font> Don't blink, or you might just miss it! Here I go! On the count of <font color="#ffd200">three</font>!

One, twoooooo—! Two and a half! And another quarter! And a half of a quarter! And another! Then, threee! ...And that's when I'm gonna do it. Now pay real close attention. Got it? One, two, three... Seriously, make sure you're watching.
Tell him he doesn't have to do it if he isn't confident.
You jerk! I was just about to do it and you threw my <font color="#ffd200">timing</font> all off! This time for real... Hup!—Oof...
Ugh... I guess my <font color="#ffd200">injuries</font> haven't healed yet. No special skills today, it seems. Too bad.
Wo hast du dir diese Verletzung geholt?
Hey! What's with all the questions! None of your damn business! <font color="#909090">(He's not going to show me anything. It's probably best to leave $npc:11001546[gender:0]$ alone...)</font>
Sorry to keep you waiting. I just got a radio message. The boss wants to see you. Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000019$</font>.
Wann beginnt der Kampf?

Well, the boss personally scheduled your fight. So we'll need to wait for the <font color="#ffd200">boss's command</font> before the fight starts. I suppose it can't start until you get to $map:63000019$...
The boss wants to see you. Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000019$</font>. You're not going to keep the boss waiting, are you?
I hear you finished your fighter registration.
Wann beginnt der Kampf?
Heh... The fight'll start in due time, so quite worrying. In the meantime, I've summoned someone I think you should <font color="#ffd200">meet</font>.
Wer ist da?

The $map:63000020$ champion you're about to fight, his name is <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$</font>. People refer to him as the <font color="#ffd200">Man of Iron</font>, or the <font color="#ffd200">Gallant Warrior</font>. Remember his face.
A gallant fight against the Gray Wolves... There's no reason why we shouldn't be celebrating this with a drink. How about joining me?
Answer that unnecessary kindness only serves to arouse suspicion.
Hmm... I thought you were fearless, but now I see you're suspicious of everything. Are you worried I might have put <font color="#ffd200">poison</font> in it?
Answer that that wouldn't surprise you at all.

What kind of lowly thug do you take me for? If I wanted to kill you, I would have turned you into <font color="#ffd200">swiss cheese</font> back at the office. Why would I go out of my way to do all of this...? <font color="#909090">(It sounds like $npc:11001623[gender:0]$ has a point.)</font>
...Say that there's no reason to refuse if that's how he thinks.
Hmph... Go to $npc:11001624[gender:0]$. She'll make you a great <font color="#ffd200">drink</font>.
Hmph... Go to $npc:11001624[gender:0]$. She'll make you a great <font color="#ffd200">drink</font>.
What can I make for you?
Ich möchte das Gleiche wie $npc:11001623[gender:0]$.
Ah, you mean the <font color="#ffd200">thing</font> the boss was talking about... It's a rare drink made from fruits fermented for over 20 years. Wait right there and I'll bring it over.
Wait until $npc:11001624[gender:0]$ is done making the drink.
... <font color="#909090">(Judging by $npc:11001624[gender:0]$'s preparation skills, I shouldn't have to wait long.)</font>
(Warte darauf, dass noch mehr Zeit ins Land geht.)
And...done. This is <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000314$</font>. Drink it slowly and savor it's fragrance.
Are you feeling alright?
Was geht hier vor?
If you're talking about the match with $npcName:110015477[gender:0]$... You <font color="#ffd200">lost</font>.
Tell him you already know that.
Then what exactly are you talking about? I'm afraid I don't understand your question.
Tell him that he can quit playing dumb.

...Okay, okay. There's no need to glower at me like that. It's not like I'm involved in what happened... I was just watching your match with $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ when I <font color="#ffd200">realized</font> something was wrong.
Tell him you felt a sudden change within your body.
I have some suspicions. ...Did you have anything to drink before the fight?
Ich habe im Gebiet $map:63000019$ etwas getrunken.
...I see. It all make sense now. <font color="#ffd200">He</font> uses that <font color="#ffd200">trick</font> quite a lot. I thought you were a pretty cautious... I guess not cautious enough.
...Answer that you fell for $npc:11001623[gender:0]$'s act.
You don't have to tell me... I know how he is. He'll find you soon. He's at <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000022$</font> for now, so head there if you must.
He'll come find you soon. He's still at <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000022$</font>, so you can head there.
You look pretty upset. If you've got something to say, say it.
Du solltest dich schämen!
Hahaha... Ashamed for what? A <font color="#ffd200">victory</font> earned through trickery is still a victory, isn't it?
Tell him it was a tainted victory.
Wow, such a boy scout... <font color="#ffd200">A tainted victory?</font> What <font color="#ffd200">nonsense</font>. Our deal from the beginning was to <font color="#ffd200">fight</font>.

Now listen up, loser. There are no rules in fighting, and that means <font color="#ffd200">deception</font> is always on the table. You lost fair and square. There's no such thing as <font color="#ffd200">honor</font> among combatants.
Tell him that's a stupid justification and that his victory is invalid.

You should watch your mouth. Even if you think <font color="#ffd200">I'm wrong</font>... If you can't convince me otherwise, then save your breath. Sometimes <font color="#ffd200">silence is worth more than gold</font>.
That's more like it. The more you talk, the more <font color="#ffd200">pathetic</font> you come off. Now, let's talk about the <font color="#ffd200">deal</font> we made.
Let's not waste any time with small talk.
Ask him what he wants of you.

Don't kid yourself. Just because you're a big deal in $map:02000100$ doesn't mean that I, $npc:11001629[gender:0]$, actually want anything from you. Well... Perhaps you could run a few <font color="#ffd200">errands</font> for me, huh?
(Nicke mit dem Kopf.)
Now you're getting it. Let's talk <font color="#ffd200">business</font>, shall we? Have you heard of $npc:11000075[gender:1]$'s <font color="#ffd200">levee</font> at $map:02000001$?
Tell him you're not interested.
Kekeke... Turning a blind eye to what's going on in the world? I won't waste my time commanding someone unworthy.
I'll assign a few people to you, so ask them for the <font color="#ffd200">instructions</font> instead. I hope you become someone worthy to be instructed by me.
Hab ich eine Wahl?

A <font color="#ffd200">choice?</font> Hahaha... Do you even have to ask? If the <font color="#ffd200">answer isn't obvious</font>, you haven't been paying attention... There will be people waiting for you at <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000023$</font>. Stop wasting my time and leave.
There will be people waiting for you at <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000023$</font>. Stop wasting my time and leave.
What is it? Can't you see I'm on an important task—hm? Oh, it's you,<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>. I've been waiting for you.
Seid ihr diejenigen, die mir $npc:11001629[gender:0]$ zugewiesen haben?
Who? $npc:11001629[gender:0]$? Watch your mouth, kid... You think the boss is your <font color="#ffd200">friend</font>? Stick with <font color="#ffd200">"Boss"</font> from now on.
Er ist nicht mein Chef.
No? But you're doing his bidding right now, correct? So quit whining and just call him "Boss."
I've <font color="#ffd200">got my eye on you</font>, so watch your back. <font color="#909090">(Are they just here to spy on me? Then it's probably best not to clash with them.)</font>
Bist du bereit? Beeil dich, Zeit ist Geld.
What are the <font color="#ffd200">instructions</font>?

I hope you're aware of how long it's been since the Empress has had an open court in $map:02000001$. You do know, right? All types of people will gather in the city from various regions. Boss wouldn't miss a chance like this.

Our organization has already finished cornering the market of the various goods that will be sold during the open court. We just need to send the goods to $map:02000001$ and the money will start flowing in.

Your mission is to transport our valuables to Tria safely. Your identity has already been taken care of to be a member of the open court caravan support force. All you have to do is go to $map:02000062$ and work with the royal guards.

Remember... The reason why boss included a fighter like you to this mission is because we're dealing with a large amount of extremely valuable goods. If our weak guards were to come across thieves, there wouldn't be anyone to protect our goods.
Now, if you understand, leave for $map:02000062$. This is a small mission for someone like you.
Wie auch immer, ich habe ein Auto gemietet, um dich direkt nach $map:02000062$ zu bringen. Also los!
Hallo! Du siehst aus wie $male:ein Abenteurer,female:eine Abenteurerin$. Wir suchen nach Helfern für die Bewachung unserer Handelskarawane, falls du Interesse hast.
Genau.
Haha, you look strong. I feel reassured. Go into the office and report to the officer.
The boss is waiting.
The boss is waiting.
How was the drink $npc:11001624[gender:0]$ made you?
Das war ganz in Ordnung.
Your response is disappointing, having tasted a rare drink. You know that drink is very hard to come by, right?
Heh... That one's either got <font color="#ffd200">good taste</font>... Or maybe the fool's just a <font color="#ffd200">bumpkin</font> who wouldn't know good taste if it smacked'm across the face.

What? Stare all you want, I don't have your gear. Your gems were placed in the <font color="#ffd200">display case</font> when you were moved to the <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000024$</font>. The display case is below here, so collect your things before you leave.

What? Stare all you want, I don't have your gear. Your gems were placed in the <font color="#ffd200">display case</font> when you were moved to the <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000024$</font>. The display case is below here, so collect your things before you leave.
Maybe it's just me, but... You look a little awkward handling those gems... Are you sure you're okay?
...Answer that you're fine.
Hm... Are you sure? You can rest a little more if you want... You don't have to be so stubborn.
Then at least take this. You don't want to faint again during training. Take this immediately if you start feeling unwell.

It's kind of a hassle to get out and start training... I'd love to stay here and rest, but... No, no. Brother <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ </font> will give me an <font color="#ffd200">earful</font>, no doubt about it.
And it seems like you've more or less regained your strength... You should start heading to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000025$</font>.
You should start heading to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000025$</font>. You are ready, right?

The core training of our <font color="#ffd200">guidance</font> involves <font color="#ffd200">becoming one</font> with nature. Of course...<font color="#ffd200">100 years</font> is still a ways to go with your weak physical vessel.
Ich werde mein Training fortsetzen.

Nonsense! We'll resume the <font color="#ffd200">interrupted training</font> later. It'll only be an issue if you pass out again. Tell me, do you know why your mind and body are so <font color="#ffd200>weak</font>?
Ich habe gehört, dass mein Animaru nicht passt.

You are well informed. The Animaru in your body is not originally yours. You must remember that a <font color="#ffd200">master's fruition</font>, earned after a <font color="#ffd200">hundred of years</font> of dedication, has been given you, a stranger.
Strictly speaking, being unable to wield the power, and also being overtaken by it, comes from the fact you are not <font color="#ffd200">balanced</font>.
The balance between the mind and the body can become unstable at any time. One must be in a constant struggle to <font color="#ffd200">rebalance themselves</font>.
Are you ready?
Mit welchem Training soll ich beginnen?
We will start with the simplest one—training your sense of balance. You will be required to <font color="#ffd200">balance on pillars</font>.
Brauche ich denn noch mehr Grundlagentraining?
One who faints shouldn't be so quick to speak up... I'd say you need at least 20 more years of <font color="#ffd200">basic training</font>.
This training requires you to climb the pillar in the puddle behind me. This can increase your jump, courage, and balance.

Although this training usually consists of climbing dozens of pillars, considering the level of your skill, I have erected only a few pillars. When you are ready, climb to the <font color="#ffd200">tallest pillar</font>.
What are you staring at? If you're ready, climb up the <font color="#ffd200">tallest pillar</font>.
...Why are you making a face as though you've <font color="#ffd200">accomplished something great</font>?
Answer that you've climbed up and down the tallest pillar.

My eyes aren't just for decoration, you know. You've <font color="#ffd200">wasted</font> a bunch of time on one of the most <font color="#ffd200">basic forms of training</font>! You've got a long ways to go!
...Ask if you must climb the pillar again.
No need. Think doing it again so soon will make you any better?
Now we'll see how accomplished you are in your skills, including your ability to control gems. How do you feel about your skills so far?
Answer that you'll leave that judgment up to Brother.
Können wir direkt mit dem Training beginnen?

I haven't said much... But <font color="#ffd200">4</font> <font color="#ffd200">seasons</font> have already passed since you arrived here. And considering the power you already have... You should have mastered the <font color="#ffd200">basics</font> of Animaru by now.
In order to properly <font color="#ffd200">understand</font> the <font color="#ffd200">method of utilizing</font> the skill passed down by guidance, we revisit the concept of Animaru once again.
$MyPCName$! What is <font color="#ffd200">Animaru</font>?
Answer that it produces power by unifying the body with nature.
...Answer that your memory is a bit hazy at the moment.
Attempt to explain that it is an elaborate power.

To break down the boundaries between self and nature, and to draw in the power of two and condense it as one... That is the basic structure of Animaru. The people of the outside world draw upon powers similar to Animaru. They call it <font color="#ffd200">magic</font>... This is otherwise known as <font color="#ffd200">SP</font>.
Animaru is necessary in order to properly utilize guidance powers. Never forget this.
Ja.
...An answer I expected. How many times must I explain? Listen well.

To break down the boundaries between self and nature, and to draw in the power of two and condense it as one... That is the basic structure of Animaru. The people of the outside world draw upon powers similar to Animaru. They call it <font color="#ffd200">magic</font>... This is otherwise known as <font color="#ffd200">SP</font>.
Ja.
..."Complicated"? What is <font color="#ffd200">"complicated"</font>?
Mumble that Animaru is...complicated.
Don't you think before speaking!? To give such a haphazard answer...are you mocking my teachings?
Answer that is not the case.

...To break down the boundaries between self and nature, and to draw in the power of two and condense it as one... That is the basic structure of Animaru. Got it? The people of the outside world draw upon powers similar to Animaru. They call it <font color="#ffd200">magic</font>... This is otherwise known as <font color="#ffd200">SP</font>. I'll ask again later, so make sure to remember that!
Ja.
You still have not listened to the <font color="#ffd200">main issue</font>... Are you sure that you don't need to hear it?
Listen to Brother $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$'s story again.
Dann los, beginnen wir mit dem Training.

Hm...then let's start with <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100011$</font>? $skill:11100011$ is a great skill on its own... But it also draws in the missing Animaru. Try <font color="#ffd200">using $skill:11100011$</font>!
I see you've yet to reach enlightenment. Focus on your training! We'll start with <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100011$</font>.
Don't stand around like a fool. My <font color="#ffd200">evaluation</font> isn't finished yet. What is the next <font color="#ffd200">skill</font> you're about to showcase?
Answer that it is $skill:11100041$.
The $skill:11100011$ you showcased is as easy as simply unloading some Animaru. <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100041$</font>, on the other hand, is a little different.
Drawing upon a large quantity of Animaru requires a great amount of focus, and timing is very important to make sure it does not wither away or explode.

Just as you can use $skill:11100011$ to <font color="#ffd200">create</font> Animaru or burn up <font color="#ffd200">recovered</font> Animaru in an instant, <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100041$</font> is a skill where you can consume it while fiercely discharging it at the same time. It's an effective ability, and easy to notice its differences from $skill:11100011$.
Was gibt’s?
Bitte die Kurzfassung.

You will experience a block in the Animaru's circulation if you use it mindlessly. Just as tea must be poured into a teacup before experiencing it... You must not forget that <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100011$</font> must be used to <font color="#ffd200">supplement</font> drained Animaru during a restless battle.

Even if explaining it is complicated, actually understanding it is actually quite simple. Instantly bring forth Animaru, and then release. Quickly condense the power, and release. Just don't forget these two steps. Got it?
Ja.
It will be for the best if you know how to efficiently use $skill:11100041$. Are you sure you don't need to hear it?
Listen to Brother $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$'s story again.
Tell him that it does not matter.
Then what are you waiting for? Show me your <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100041$</font>!
What are you waiting for? Show me your <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100041$</font>.
Hm... It looks like you've mastered the <font color="#ffd200">method</font>, more or less.
Wann kann ich Fähigkeiten für Fortgeschrittene erlernen?
You want to learn some new skills?
Answer that this is obviously the case for a Vanquisher.

As $npc:11001556[gender:0]$ said... It is more important <font color="#ffd200">to not forget what you know</font> than to learn something new. To want something new before completing what you've started... Well...
That is what you seem to be doing now. Take this to heart.
$MyPCName$, there's no need to get impatient. The master has instructed me to bring you to him once your training is done. Go and meet the master.
Wo kann ich den Meister finden?
